trans-unit.source: Represents an SQL transaction to be made at a data source.
This class cannot be inherited.
The application creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction> object by calling <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: La aplicación crea un <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction> objeto mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> en la <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: All subsequent operations associated with the transaction (for example, committing or aborting the transaction) are performed on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction> object.
trans-unit.target: Todas las operaciones posteriores asociadas con la transacción (por ejemplo, confirmar o anular la transacción) se realizan en el <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> and an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> y <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction>.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: También muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>, y <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Rollback%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Commits the database transaction.
The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> and an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> y <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction>.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: También muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>, y <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Rollback%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
-or-
The connection is broken.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection" /> object associated with the transaction, or <see langword="null" /> if the transaction is no longer valid.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: La <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection" /> objeto asociado a la transacción.

trans-unit.source: A single application may have multiple database connections, each with zero or more transactions.
trans-unit.target: Una única aplicación puede tener varias conexiones de base de datos, cada uno con cero o más transacciones.

trans-unit.source: This property lets you determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction created by <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad permite determinar el objeto de conexión asociado a una transacción concreta creada por <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
The default depends on the underlying ODBC driver.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado depende del controlador ODBC subyacente.

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
Therefore, the <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> applies to the whole transaction.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, el <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> se aplica a toda la transacción.

trans-unit.source: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.

The transaction can be rolled back only from a pending state (after <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> has been called, but before <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A> is called).
trans-unit.target: Revierte la transacción puede ser sólo desde un estado pendiente (después de <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> se ha llamado, pero antes <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A> se denomina).

trans-unit.source: The transaction will be rolled back in the event it is disposed before `Commit` or `Rollback` is called.
trans-unit.target: La transacción se revertirá en el evento se elimina antes de `Commit` o `Rollback` se llama.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> and an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> y <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction>.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: También muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>, y <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Rollback%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
-or-
The connection is broken.
